focus: Easy Saturday: light house reset, Finland prep, and one Eva/Claude Code block.

adhdFocus.label: Today's Focus
adhdFocus.title: One small cluster at a time
adhdFocus.description: Pick one small cluster (physical or digital), close it fully, then move on. Avoid starting five zones and finishing none.
adhdFocus.strategy: Choose a single area (home office today), clear trash, group 'elsewhere' items into one box, and stop when the timer ends—even if it's not perfect.

Home office tidy (one-zone focus) and stage returns in one place
Eva / Claude Code upgrade focus block (about 60 minutes)
Optional Sunset & Moon Walk; gentle wind-down
